Use the following generation settings:

generated_body: If you click on the article titled "The cost to become a US citizen is going up 61 percent," you can expect to read about the significant increase in fees associated with the US naturalization process. The article is likely to provide details on the new fee structure, comparisons to previous costs, and the implications of this change for potential immigrants. It may also include insights from immigration experts or advocates regarding how this hike could affect the number of applicants seeking citizenship in the United States.
